item.title: By: Arthur Seaton
item.dc:creator: Arthur Seaton
item.description: Hmmm...I'm not sure where my message went. I'm not even sure what I wrote, but I think I mentioned "I Often Dream of Trains" and "Jumping Someone Else's Train."
item.content:encoded: Hmmm…I’m not sure where my message went. I’m not even sure what I wrote, but I think I mentioned “I Often Dream of Trains” and “Jumping Someone Else’s Train.”

item.title: By: Big City Sheep

item.description: "On Tooting Broadway Station" -- Kitchens of Distinction (More of a train station song, but still...)
item.content:encoded:

(More of a train station song, but still…)
